directions: Combine black beans, avocados, mango, tomatoes, red onion, and cilantro in a large bowl. Pour lemon juice on top and season with salt and pepper. Mix until well combined.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed, or more to taste
2  yellow mango - peeled, pitted, and cubed
2  tomatoes, chopped, or more to taste
¼ cup chopped fresh cilantro, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Black Bean and Mango Salad
